translation_en: The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ taught: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.

text_arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ جَمِيلٌ يُحِبُّ الْجَمَالَ
translation_en: The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ said: Allah is beautiful and loves beauty.

text_arabic: الْمُسْلِمُ مَنْ سَلِمَ الْمُسْلِمُونَ مِنْ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
translation_en: It was narrated that the Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: A Muslim is one from whose tongue and hand other Muslims are safe.

text_arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ رَفِيقٌ يُحِبُّ الرِّفْقَ فِي الأَمْرِ كُلِّهِ
translation_en: The Prophet ﷺ taught us: Allah is gentle and loves gentleness in all matters.

text_arabic: مَا مِنْ مُسْلِمٍ يَغْرِسُ غَرْساً أَوْ يَزْرَعُ زَرْعاً فَيَأْكُلُ مِنْهُ طَيْرٌ أَوْ إِنْسَانٌ أَوْ بَهِيمَةٌ إِلاَّ كَانَ لَهُ بِهِ صَدَقَةٌ
translation_en: Allah's Messenger ﷺ said: No Muslim plants a tree or sows a seed, and then a bird, person, or animal eats from it, except that it is charity for them.

text_arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَرْضَى لَكُمْ ثَلاَثاً وَيَكْرَهُ لَكُمْ ثَلاَثاً يَرْضَى لَكُمْ أَنْ تَعْبُدُوهُ وَلاَ تُشْرِكُوا بِهِ شَيْئاً
translation_en: The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ taught: Allah is pleased with three things from you and dislikes three things from you. He is pleased that you worship Him and do not associate anything with Him.

text_arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى
translation_en: The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ said: Actions are judged by intentions, and each person will be rewarded according to their intention.

text_arabic: مَنْ حَسَّنَ إِسْلامَهُ كَانَ لَهُ كُلُّ حَسَنَةٍ يَعْمَلُهَا بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ عَشْرَ أَمْثَالِهَا إِلَى سَبْعِمِائَةِ ضِعْفٍ
translation_en: It was narrated that the Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: Whoever perfects their Islam, every good deed they do after that will be multiplied tenfold up to seven hundred times.

text_arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لاَ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى أَجْسَامِكُمْ وَلاَ إِلَى صُوَرِكُمْ وَلَكِنْ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى قُلُوبِكُمْ
translation_en: The Prophet ﷺ taught us: Allah does not look at your bodies or your appearances, but He looks at your hearts.
